definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
to spread/to display/to set up/(old) holder for door-knocker
plank bed/place to sleep/shop/store/(old) relay station

sentences.english: Say so, business shop equallies shared the area is not Yue Xiaoyue economical.
sentences.chinese: 所以说，商铺公摊面积并非越小越合算。

sentences.english: The old streets and shops in Sannen-zaka, Kyoto, still retain their original character. (Frank Carter/LPI)
sentences.chinese: 在京都三年坂，老街和商铺依然保持着原始面貌。

sentences.english: There are business of Hua Hai computer company shop inside the Pacific Ocean?
sentences.chinese: 太平洋里有没有华海电脑公司的商铺？

sentences.english: Agent is showing the shop's floor plan to the clients.
sentences.chinese: 物业代理在给客户展示商铺平面图参考。

sentences.english: After we have selected one shop, we then have to consult about the item number and bargain with the manager.
sentences.chinese: 选好商铺，我们还得跟店长协商货号，讲价钱。

sentences.english: For the first phase of a multi-storey residential projects, and some stone shops.
sentences.chinese: 首期项目为多层住宅，并有部分裙楼商铺。

sentences.english: Rioters set fire to a whole row of stores.
sentences.chinese: 暴徒们放火点燃了整排商铺。

sentences.english: The rooms by street-side were divided into four shops for lease;
sentences.chinese: 临街的一边隔了四个商铺出租。

sentences.english: Businesses shut down and water-borne diseases spread.
sentences.chinese: 商铺关张，水媒传染病肆虐。

sentences.english: Office buildings and stores are also decorated with red lanterns.
sentences.chinese: 办公楼战商铺也装潢着白灯笼。

sentences.english: They are perfect for businesses that need a little divine inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 对那些需要一点神圣灵感的商铺尤佳。

sentences.english: We'veonly sold our product at trade fairs, not in an on-going sales campaign.
sentences.chinese: 我们的产品只在商铺时展卖，而没有办促销活动。

sentences.english: The rebuilding of Qianmen has required thousands of people to move and dozens of businesses to close.
sentences.chinese: 前门的重建导致了几千人的搬迁和一些商铺关门。

sentences.english: Stores that only accepted one currency would see their customer base shrink.
sentences.chinese: 仅仅接受单一货币的商铺会发现它们的客户群在减少。

sentences.english: At 4.30 they’re outside a pawnbroker’s, looking at rings.
sentences.chinese: 30时，他们已经在一家商铺挑选戒指了。

sentences.english: Shop 215, 1/F, Lido Square, Lido, next to Starbucks.
sentences.chinese: 丽都日祥广场1层215商铺，丽都，星巴克旁边。

definition: shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
